alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL CRITTENDEN... SOUTHWESTERN TIPTON AND NORTHERN SHELBY COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Downtown Memphis, or 7 miles northeast of West Memphis, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, West Memphis, Marion, Millington, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Dixonville, Downtown Memphis, Frayser, Mound City, Griffin Corner, Gammon, Quito, Woodstock, St Clair, Locke, Sloanville, Raleigh, Gilestown, and Spring Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
